has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:attackType</field><value name="VAL"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">bash</field></block></value><next><block type="item_animation"><field name="name">CUSTOM:Rustysword</field><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="animation"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">animation.weaponartitem.</field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="variables_get_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:attackType</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="play_animation"><field name="active">&& !animation.isActive()</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="animation"><block type="variables_get_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:attackType</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_itemstack"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:hitbox_item</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">To make sure the right item is used and no move-swaps are done</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:hitbox_type</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Simply defines what hitbox to use.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="variables_get_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:attackType</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:hitbox_delay</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Defines how many ticks it takes before the attack connects.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block name="VAR">global:hitbox_size</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is a multiplier affecting the size of the hitbox.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:hitbox_distance</field><comment pinned="false" h="133" w="233">This is a multiplier affecting the vector defining how far in front of the player's camera should the hitbox be made.</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:hitbox_damage</field><comment pinned="false" h="133" w="233">This is a multiplier affecting the amount of damage based on the weapon's damage the weapon art deals</comment><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
